overview:
Entrepreneur, CEO, Writer, Technology Builder of Enterprise 2.0 software, mobile apps, and social networks…Love God, my family and the USA

Mark Carbone is a technology builder. Heâ€™s the owner and CEO of XE Corporation, an award winning enterprise software firm in Orlando, FL for ten years where he created the first business management engine for entrepreneurs â€“ XE-700. His company also creates mobile apps for iPhone, Android, Blackberryâ€¦, and social networks for companies in multiple industries including - Subway, SunTrust Bank, and Mears Transportation. He also serves as CTO for Kingdom Racing, an Indy Car racing team where his technology helps the team do more with less.

He also helps companies build their social media strategy (Twitter, Facebook, Ning, YouTube) from movie companies to national leadership organizations.

His faith in God is first in his life along with his beautiful wife, Susan, and first child on the way!

He received his MBA from Rollins College in Strategy and Finance. Founding editor of the Rollins Business Journal, and served on the alumni board for seven years. Heâ€™s a graduate of Lifework Leadership, member of C12, speaks to CEOâ€™s and at colleges about technology, and was nominated for most influential businessman of 2007 by the OBJ.
